scripts.build: npm run policy-check && npm run layer-check && npm run build:genver && npm run build:compile && npm run tslint && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:genver && lerna run build:compile:min --stream
scripts.build:docs: npm run clean:docs && lerna run build:docs --stream --parallel && npm run build:gendocs
scripts.build:full: npm run build:genver && npm run build:full:compile && npm run tslint && npm run build:docs
scripts.bump-version: lerna version minor --no-push --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:genver
scripts.clean: lerna run clean --stream --parallel && npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:nyc
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:lerna && (npm run postinstall:fluid-build || true)
scripts.layer-check:full: cd tools/fluid-build && npm install && npm run build && npm run layer-check
scripts.policy-check:full: cd tools/repo-policy-check && npm install && npm run policy-check
scripts.postinstall:fluid-build: cd tools/fluid-build && npm i && npm run build
scripts.sort-package-json: sort-package-json && sort-package-json ./{server,tools}/*/package.json && sort-package-json ./samples/*/*/package.json && lerna exec -- sort-package-json ./package.json
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:report;t1=$?;npm run test:copyresults; exit $t1
scripts.test:ci:coverage: npm run test:coverage;t1=$?;npm run test:copyresults; exit $t1
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:tsc" "npm run watch:esnext" "npm run watch:webpack"
